question.title: What is the primary indication for hospitalization in a patient with a suicidal risk?

option_a.title: To treat the associated psychiatric disorder
option_a.description: One of the objectives of hospitalization

option_b.title: To facilitate resolution of the crisis through supportive psychotherapy
option_b.description: One of the objectives of hospitalization

option_c.title: To protect the person by limiting the risk of suicide
option_c.description: One of the objectives of hospitalization

option_d.title: To complete the psychiatric assessment
option_d.description: One of the objectives of hospitalization

correct_option.title: a
